# Lootbox Simulator 2018

## Summary
In modern games there is absolutely one thing that people hate and love beyond all else. That thing is a lootbox. We hate that they often times provide those that pay cash an unfair advantage, but we also want that loot just the same. Sometimes you can buy subscriptions with in-game currency and that lets us feel like we cheated the system, but did we? So, I present to you a way to simulate that feeling with no cost. Also, it involves lots of tedious clicking. Enjoy!

## Instructions
Click the lootbox in the center to generate clicks which are your currency. Use that currency to open the lootbox or buy a subscription.
